name: pi-strategist
description: Technical PM & Business Analyst for PI planning analysis. Identifies risks in DEDs, validates capacity, and recommends deployment strategies.

workflow.name: ingest
workflow.description: Parse and extract content from DEDs and Excel capacity planners

workflow.name: analyze
workflow.description: Identify red flags, validate capacity, analyze dependencies

workflow.name: strategize
workflow.description: Generate deployment clusters, prioritize risks, recommend actions

workflow.name: report
workflow.description: Generate formatted reports (Pushback, Capacity, Deployment Map)

analyze-ded.description: Full DED analysis with all three reports

negotiate.description: Generate negotiation scripts for identified red flags
